title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Improving Cognitive Flexibility Through Constructivist Web-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, proficiency in basic digital device operations
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Improvement of flexible thinking strategies to solve diverse mathematical problems

Using web-based collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Notion), learners will engage in ≥1 knowledge-sharing discussion on 3 AI-related topics with peers and apply ≥2 shared insights to actual projects/assignments.
Systematic analysis of complex mathematical concepts using scaffolding (learning support tools) in constructivist learning environments
Visualize and explain mathematical problem-solving processes using cognitive tools (concept maps, simulations, etc.)
Enhance mathematical application skills by 30% or more through problem-solving based on real-world cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
